name: Rapture - World Conquest
description: Rapture - World Conquest is a fast paced real-time strategy game that puts you in the celestial shoes of a jealous god. Guide your followers through the ages and vanquish the unbelievers in the surrounding kingdoms. Send your armies to take over regions and expand your realm.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3, Vista, Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.4Ghz Dual Core or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compliant video card (Shader Model 3.0) with 256MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
